main event: A civilian reported observing a UFO in Dayton, Ohio on December 14, 1966, for a duration of 3-5 minutes.
interesting points: Physical evidence was reported at the sighting location,The object was noted to change shapes and glow,Contact was made with an aircraft advertising company regarding a possible unrelated sighting,Two individuals were directly involved in the report,Similar observations were noted by witnesses from different areas.
sighted object: an unidentified flying object with lights
